item.title: SoFi’s stock is on fire, and so is its business. These earnings numbers show why.
item.description: The financial-technology company racked up a number of records in its third quarter as loan demand soared.

item.title: UnitedHealth’s stock surges as medical costs rise, but less than investors feared
item.description: UnitedHealth’s stock was set to surge as medical costs rose less than feared and the profit outlook was raised.

item.title: Here’s how much money PayPal is making from Venmo — and more earnings takeaways as the stock soars
item.description: PayPal is also instituting its first dividend, boosting its full-year forecast and partnering with OpenAI.

item.title: AI is gobbling up power and money — and sidelining this big issue, Blackstone and BlackRock CEOs say
item.description: The biggest minds in finance weighed in on AI, investing and the U.S. economy at a Saudi Arabia conference on Tuesday.

item.title: U.S. says $80 billion worth of nuclear reactors will be built. Cameco’s stock jumps.
item.description: The U.S. government announced a pact to build at least $80 billion worth of nuclear reactors, in a pact to meet the growing power demands caused by ar...
